competitors.name: Puppet
competitors.notes: Established configuration management and infrastructure automation

competitors.name: Ansible
competitors.notes: IT automation for configuration management and deployment

context: In 2014, HashiCorp (founded 2012) had just released Terraform. Vault had not yet been released (launched 2015). The infrastructure as code market was in early stages dominated by traditional configuration management tools like Puppet, Chef, and Ansible.
